isis.stitle: TSI 92-08-06 - Delco 21SI Alternator Regulator Terminal Corrosion

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all vehicles with Detroit Diesel Series 60 Engines and Delco 21SI alternators.

The Delco 21SI alternator uses a rubber boot ( Figure 1) over the unused regulator terminals. The manner in which the alternator is mounted on Detroit Diesel Series 60 engines allows dirt and moisture to accumulate in the boot, causing regulator terminal corrosion and eventual regulator failure. To prevent this from happening, remove and discard the rubber boot.

caution.para: If using a metal tool to remove the rubber boot, use care not to "short" between the regulator terminals and the alternator case as the regulator terminals are electrically "hot" and the alternator case is grounded.
